website_summaries.verdict: Sleek and durable acrylic cosmetics cabinet. 6 storage drawers keep accessories organized in a functional way.
pros: This cabinet includes four small drawers and three large drawers
This cabinet is large enough to fit everything you need, but not too bulky to take up too much counter space
cons: Some users find the drawers difficult to slide out as they can come of their tracks easily

customer_reviews.title: It looks to me like the size is too small to even rate being ...
customer_reviews.text: The drawers don't stay in the little "tracks". It looks to me like the size is too small to even rate being called a drawer track. It's impossible to pull out one drawer at a time. Each drawer sits on drawer below below it. I'm using it, but it irritates me every time I get something out or put something in. I would not recommend this product to anyone. Good idea/bad design
customer_reviews.author: carol peck

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product. I am using it for a desk organizer, not for make up and it’s great. The only thing I didn’t love is that the drawers will just fall out if you pull them all the way, there is no lip holding them in. Overall great product and shipped very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: good quality, a little bit loud when opening drawers. but great for makeup and small things. i use it for my foundation, concealer, palates, and compacts, etc. great for my makeup desk!
customer_reviews.author: C. Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: ... fit bit watch accessories and some jewelry and it’s great. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this to organize my fit bit watch accessories and some jewelry and it’s great. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Dental operatory
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work at a dental office, perfect size for the counter and quick access so I don’t have to move my chair and table to get to annoying lower drawers. Fits right next to sink and still leaves access to countertop garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on this organizer. It looks much more expensive than it is, and I was personally surprised how much makeup it holds!

customer_reviews.title: A must have for make up lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Love! So durable and can hold a ton of make up!

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize my make-up
customer_reviews.text: Great way to organize my make-up. The drawers are the perfect size and it is easy to find what I am looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice little box for organizing stuff. Got for my granddaughter along with other things and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Especially for an organization fanatic
customer_reviews.text: The size, shapes, and number of drawers was ideal. I would recommend this for anyone who has variety in types of makeup also in cleansers.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful with organizing. Easy to clean and lasts forever comes in handy with numerous things easy to place anywhere and looks amazing. Great product would recommend overall to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, sturdy organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Much more room than I thought it would have. Nice sized drawers and compartments. This organizer keeps my brushes and tools clean and dust free.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer was exactly what I was looking for. I was pleasantly surprised that I was able to put so many of my makeup items in the drawers. Now I'm back again to purchase a second one to store fingernail polish and hair clips, etc. So nice that I can see everything all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: CurtCyn

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Very deep drawers, can hold a lot. Keeps everything organized. I ended up ordering three for using it for different purposes.

customer_reviews.title: Works well as an organizer for cosmetics. The drawers ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as an organizer for cosmetics. The drawers stick sometimes, but it is plastic and you get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with drawers sizes and variety too

customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the product. Fits all my makeup stuff with see through drawers. The right size that fits in my dresser top.

customer_reviews.title: Clear, you can see what is stored inside
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Smaller then expected however, it fits alot of products. I have more makeup so I'll be ordering another one later. It's clear and you can see what you have . Happy customer, this item is a little pricey. $20 would be a perfect price .
customer_reviews.author: Ness

product_meta.title: EZOWare Makeup Organizer Acrylic Cosmetic Organizer with 7 Drawer Display Storage Container Box Case for Jewelry, Beauty Products, Supplies, Medicine and More - Clear
feature_bullets: [ BEST ORGANIZATION ] The EZOWare Clear Acrylic Make-up Drawer Chest offers an attractive solution to keep rooms and personal areas clear and organized with clearly visible storage for beauty supplies, jewelry, stationery, and other items.

[ FASHIONABLE DESIGN ] Clear acrylic construction to make it easy to see and display makeup and other items. Clear drawer pulls and easy-glide drawers for convenience. The drawers slide completely out and for better organization or to move and use as a portable tray.

[ FITS MOST ITEMS ] Easy storage and access to lipsticks, eyebrow pencil, eyeliner, blush, mascara, nail polishes, blending brushes, applicators, palettes, hair clips & ties, rings, necklaces, and other beauty or personal products.

[ 7 DRAWER CAPACITY ] Drawers: 4 Small drawers : 6 x 3.8 x 1.9 inch (15 x 9.5 x 4.8 cm) - for pencils, lipsticks, and more. 3 Long drawers: 8.5 x 5.8 x 1.9 inch (21.7 x 14.7 x 4.8 cm) - for brushes and larger items. Unit Dimensions: 9.4 x 11.2 x 6.3 inches (28.5 x 24 x 16cm).

[ PERFECT FOR ANY ROOM ] Use in bathrooms, on vanities, dressers, for office supplies storage, small crafting supply storage, art supply storage, kids room organization & more. It will match the decor and style of most rooms, office, or home office.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars52 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
